replies.body: yi is the most broken unskilled champion. REQ = PENTAKILLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL

Yeet. I main jayce, have a master lvl 5, but I recently started playing Yi because he would always kick my ass. So of course... my first game with Yi was 32/3/2. And my second was 6/6/1. So now I'm confused... is he good or bad? But then, I played him again: 45/3/3. So now I am beginning to play Master Yi a lot more.

Stuff it, thats 2 much work
